safety_n_security.label: Hand-sanitizer and/or sanitizing wipes in common areas
Additional safety measures during food prep and serving.
Masks and/or gloves available for guests
No single use plastic water bottles

policyLit.title: Guarantee Policy
policyLit.description: Without advance or credit card authorization no reservations are guaranteed. Hotel authority has complete right to cancel the non guaranteed reservation at any time without prior notice

policyLit.title: Complimentary
policyLit.description: Breakfast at the All Day Dining Restaurant, Gym & Swimming pool with appropriate attire, Wi-Fi, 2 bottles of drinking water. • Child Policy: Extra breakfast will be charged on above 05 years child & Extra bed will be applicable on above 10 years child from Studio

description.description: This hotel is great for sure! This adorable one bedroom apartment is on the edge of fashionable Soho and Tribeca and would make a great base for a hip couple wanting to be in the heart of the action - it has plenty of great restaurants.
